body.name: SUNMORY Floor Lamp with Shelves,Modern Dimmable Solid Wood Standing Lamp with 1 Drawer and 2 USB Ports & 2 Power Outlet,Corner Tall Bookshelf Lamp for Living Room and Bedroom(Black)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: 【2 Charging USB Ports & 2 Power Outlet】The modern floor lamp with drawer has 2 -charging USB ports and 2 power outlet, which can charge 4 devices like cell phone, tablet or bluetooth speaker in the same time.This will reduce the confusion of charging cables in the living room, bedroom and office, and improve the convenience of life and work.

【30,000 Hour Life 3 Color Temperatures LED Bulb Included】SUNMORY shelf lamp includes a 9 Watt, 800 lumen power saving LED bulb ,so you don’t need to buy extra bulb.The LED lamp bulb is 3 color temp : 3000K/5000K/4000K.It can be used not only as a living room decoration but also as narrow night stands for bedrooms.Also can work with smart outlets that are Alexa, Google Home Assistant, or Apple HomeKit enabled(requires smart outlet sold separately).

【Real Solid Wood】SUNMORY multifunctional floor lamp are made of solid wood with stable structure and more durable.Wood grains can be seen on the lamp stands and shelves.With the cloth lampshade, it shows the elegance and simplicity of the classic Asian style.It is very suitable as a gift for Mother's Day, Thanksgiving Day, or Christmas.

【1 Drawer & 3 Shelves】SUNMORY floor lamps with 3 shelves and 1 drawer.Small things that are easy to lose can be placed in the drawer, such as keys, remote control, glasses, etc;Ornamental items can be placed on the shelf, such as crafts, vases, books, etc.It is a good choice whether it is by the sofa, desk, bedside, TV, corridor or door.It's not only Japanese style vertical lamp, but also corner storage tall bookshelf lamp.

【Easy Assembly】You can find the installation steps including text and video in the user manual on this page in the "Product guides and documents ".Supplied with installation tools,it doesn’t take much time to build up, perfect for DIY lovers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SUNMORY-Light the world, warm your heart. Gift for those whom you love. Every home is a little world, light and warmth belong to you. We are committed to exploring the harmonious unity of science and nature, practicality and beauty. Not only bring you convenience but also decorate your home. Tips: The shelf floor lamp needs to be assembled before use.

Warm yellow light Warm your heart Warm yellow lighting creates a cozy atmosphere, perfect for movie time or a romantic dinner. Yellowish light Soft and eye protection This color temperature is softer than white daylight and protects your eyes when light is provided. White daylight Light your home White daylight is suitable for office and daily lighting, and this color temperature can be used when you want more light. SUNMORY is obsessed with providing high-quality lighting and furniture designed for a cozy life. We work to make design inclusive, simple, elegant, and available for various living spaces as well as promoting to light up your life.

Focus on details and make better products Charging Station The tall lamp has 2 charging USB ports(5V/2A) and 1 2-hole power socket. You can charge your phone or iPad. Storage drawer The floor lamp has a drawer for storing small things, this is a perfect combination of the bedside table, table lamp, and power strip. Real Solid Wood Our floor lamp with shelves is made of solid wood, which is more durable and beautiful. Sturdy and durable Our floor lamps can hold up to 50 pounds per shelf, and you can place some heavy objects on them.
Previous page Next page 1 Floor lamp for study 2 Floor lamp in living room 3 Floor lamp for bedroom
Put the shelf lamp anywhere you prefer Beside the TV Beside the sofa Beside your bed

Do I need to buy a light bulb？ It contains a three-color temperature bulb, but if you want smart regulation, you need to buy a smart light bulb and socket. Is it made of solid wood? The lamp pole is solid wood and the board is MDF. Is it stable on the carpet? Yes, it is .Our wooden shelf lamp weighs 12.76 pounds. In addition, you can also increase its stability by placing heavy objects on the bottom shelf, such as flower pots, books, etc. Is this floor lamp easy to assemble? It is very easy, and most people can assemble it in about ten minutes. Many children can complete this work independently and have great fun in the assembly process. Is there anything special about this lamp? This floor lamp contains a bulb, 3 shelves, a drawer, and a charging station, which is very practical, not only for lighting, but also for storage racks, and for charging electronic devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Here’s the real reason this is such a clever and useful product…
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful multi-functional product at a very reasonable price. This great product is difficult to describe in just a few statements. Obviously it is categorized on Amazon as a floor lamp, but what it really is a useful space creator. For me, it frees up valuable kitchen counter space that I had been using as a battery charging center, and lets me create a freestanding charging station in the unobtrusive guise of a useful, well designed floor lamp.Yes, this is an excellent self-standing floor lamp, but the real reason it is so useful is how it frees up the limited kitchen counter space I was wasting as a messy battery charging center. If you are like me and my friends, you probably are taking up space in your kitchen (as shown it the first photo I have uploaded) where you have bunch of charging adapters plugged in there because a kitchen counter is where you can easily access the power outlets. Or maybe like another good friend of mine, you have them plugged into wall outlets near the floor or in power strips creating a jumble of wires. In any case, I never realized what a poor use of space that was until I bought this unit which has a beautifully integrated charging station. Not only is it cleverly designed as a combination charging station and floor lamp, but it’s also well-constructed. I’m going to comment on the design, manufacturing, packaging, and overall value of this product which are all excellent.There are almost too many features included in this product to mention in a short review, but each one is an indication of how carefully this product has been designed, manufactured, and packaged to be sold at a price point that makes it such a great value. For example, it includes extra fasteners of each type needed so that you will never need to return this product because you accidentally misplaced one of the screws—admit it, how many times have you come up short only to “discover” the missing screw when you vacuum the carpet? All the tools needed to assemble it are provided, even the screwdriver (see uploaded photo). The assembly instructions are broken down into a sequence of well-illustrated and easily understandable steps. Included are high-friction self-sticking EVA cushion strips that are applied to the bottom of the lamp both to help keep it from slipping on hard floors, but also to help keep it from scratching your floor. It includes snap on wire clamps to hide and guide the power cord down the floor along one of the back supports. And the cord is long enough that no matter where you put it in your home, you will almost surely will be able to plug it in without needing an extension cord. These are little things that many manufacturers eliminate to cut corners and make it cheaper while ignoring the practical frustrations of their customers. This manufacturer has decided to include many extras to make the product and experience one of quality at a reasonable cost.It arrives in a sturdy, well cushioned compact carton (see uploaded photo). It is heavy corrugated cardboard with an extra layer on the bottom, carefully compartmentalized so that the parts don’t damage each other in shipping. The groups of parts are individually bagged, and several items are double boxed for protection.I’m a retired product manager, so I really admire the choices this manufacturer has made to provide a product of superior design at an affordable price. There are so many important aspects to this product that I’m just going to list a number of them that most customers might overlook. The wooden parts are precision cut and drilled, with many of the holes countersunk to make the heads of the screws flush with the surface. The support poles are connected with threaded metal fasteners and screw into threaded metal inserts as shown in an uploaded photo. This is so important because these connections are subject to a lot of force, and if cheaper wood screws were used, they would eventually work lose. Again, this is an indication of a higher quality product that is carefully engineered to last longer than cheaper alternatives. The lamp shade is made of a thick material that diffuses the light effectively without creating a small hotspot. It is cleverly constructed to fold flat for shipping, but assembles with heavy Velcro strips that hold all the edges firmly in place. The connector between the outlet box and the lamp holder safely screws together. There are two Type-A USB charging receptacles that provide 2 amps of 5 volt charging current. There is also a line voltage receptacle in which I have plugged a Type-C USB power adapter. A hidden drawer-stop keeps the drawer from accidentally being pulled out so far that it falls on the floor spilling its contents. The shelves are sturdy and conveniently create extra storage or display space, something in short supply in most homes.The three-temperature (color) bulb provided is yet another example of how this manufacture has not skimped when it would be so easy to do so. This turned out to be an unexpected benefit for me. At first I thought that this type of bulb was meant to accommodate personal preferences—many people prefer the red colored light that is similar to conventional incandescent bulbs, but I like the bluer daylight type light most of the time. But here is the secret advantage of having a choice—successive tugs on the pull switch chain changes the color from warm to bright and back again: during the day or for reading, the daylight color adds good illumination, but at night, the warm color creates a cozy ambient atmosphere.Perhaps the best aspect of this product is the one that is least noticed—how disguised as a conventional floor lamp, this mobile charging station unobtrusively blends into the background of my living space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it so much I bought TWO MORE!
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is the BEST. It’s every bit worth the money. I bought it because I hate overhead lighting with a passion. Long story short, I’ve been literally toting this lamp around the house with me because I love it 😂 So I bought two more which should be arriving tomorrow. Two for either side or our bed to act as our charging stations and a place for our water bottles and other usual nightstand fare. And to light the room as I work from home during the day in here. And one for the living room. My husband weakly protested, but he loves it too. He keeps thanking me for ordering it lol.I bought the Philips dimmable multicolor smart bulb to put in it, which is controllable via the Wiz app on my iPhone. I can make it any color, I can make it a nightlight, and I can make it come on at a pre-scheduled time (like make a dim light come on at wake-up time to help shake off the sleep).The lamp alone is beyond worth the money. But I do highly recommend using with the philip smart bulb. It’s just a remarkable combo. I’m just upset I didn’t buy this lamp and the bulbs a long time ago. It’s sturdy, sleek-looking, and HIGHLY functional. Takes up way less room than a nightstand, and the charging ports are the icing on the cake. It’s especially awesome in a small greater-NYC apartment like we have. Multi-functional and space saving. Great light in a small space that can easily change the mood and feel of an area with an otherwise closed-in, static feel. Especially if you use it with your own full-spectrum dimmable bulb.I love to put my iPad on the shelf while it charges, and it functions as a great alarm. Using shortcuts I can make it play a podcast or something at the same time my lamp is scheduled to come on in the morning.I’ll try to remember to update with more and better pictures. But just trust me and other reviewers— you will not regret this lamp purchase. I’ve wasted a fair bit of money on bad amazon purchases, but THIS was a huge win.Also, assembly was straightforward. No complaints.BUY IT! YOU’LL LOVE IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not exactly sturdy....
reviews.reviewText: Overall happy because it's functional and looks nice enough. The drawer is tiny, think pants pocket tiny. I will have to place something heavy on the bottom shelf to stabilize the unit, as it sits on carpet. The provided LED was blue white, replaced it with a 2700K soft white LED. Assembly was easy, very easy. Cheap way to get a nightstand and lamp combo with a couple outlets and USB ports. I bought two.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice lamp
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is very nice! The ability to charge your phone, as well as power, many different things through the lamp, and the three different brightness settings is very convenient and wonderful. They even include a lightbulb, which is very nice. It was easy to put together and didn’t take very long, and there was no need for any major tools, all the hardware is included that you will need! I highly recommend this lamp to anyone who likes a bedside table, a convenient drawer and extra outlets to charge all the devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST THING I HAVE BOUGHT FROM AMAZON
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t really have high hopes for this as a nightstand but it was honestly the best purchase I have made on Amazon. It took me and my husband 30-45 minutes to put together on our own and it really made our room look so much more put together. It comes with the lightbulb which has different lighting modes and all the screws/pieces. The directions were so easy to follow. I love how tall the lamp is, Our bed isn’t that high off the ground so they definitely tower a little over our bed. Perfect for someone who has a really tall bed. I’m 6’0 and it almost as tall as me. Great buy , great purchase. Definitely worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars looks great in livingroom
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up.... Looks great and very functional. I connect them to smart plugs and control them with my voice. If you want to get fancy, you can plug christmas lights into them, click off the main light and set a timer on the smart plug to turn on and off at set times. A lot you can do with these and they feel like they will last a while.

This lamp was easy to assemble and looks awesome. I love the extra features like the little drawer and the plug-ins. It’s pretty sturdy considering my german shepherd knocked it over when barking out the window and it’s still going strong haha. It looks classy and I love it! I’d buy another in the future for sure. Worth the investment in my books.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lampe de salon pratique, design, facile à monter.
reviews.reviewText: Lampe étagère pratique comme éclairage d’appoint pour lire et/ou regarder la TV. Elle propose trois tons de luminosité, chaud, froid et intermédiaire. Elle peut recharger deux téléphones ou tablettes sur prises usb et un petit tiroir pour ranger lunettes et télécommandes.Très facile à monter, les pièces en bois s’alignent bien en face des unes des autres, une clé BTR est fournie ainsi que des liens velcro pour fixer le fils électrique le long d’un montant de la lampe qui sont une agréable surprise. La tirette interrupteur est suffisante et se trouve sous la douille de l’ampoule ce qui est pratique. Bon petit produit...

Sieht super aus. Die Lampe kommt in Einzelteilen an, ist aber leicht aufzubauen anhand der Anleitung. Sie ist sehr stabil und wirkt hochwertig. Besonders toll finde ich den Ladekabelsteckplatz und die verschiedenen Varianten der Lichtwärme.
Très bon produit qualité au top ,à recommander

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Hele mooie lampen van goeie kwaliteit.We hebben er 2 en gebruiken ze als nachtkastje. Voor het gebruik van een nachtkastje is de lamp erg fel, dus er een zwakkere lamp in gedaan, maar geeft wel heel mooi licht. Ook heel handig dat er 2 usb poorten inzitten voor het opladen van je telefoon, tablet of horloge.
